sentences.en: A succession of bad harvest had reduced the small farmer to penury.
sentences.cn: 连续歉收使得这个小农场主陷入了贫困境地.

sentences.en: A succession of bad harvests had reduced the small farmers to penury.
sentences.cn: 连年歉收使小农陷入了一贫如洗的困境.

sentences.en: First of all, raising the price only can limited many persons living in penury.
sentences.cn: 首先, 提高价格只能限制许多生活穷苦的人.

sentences.en: Hardship and penury wore him out before his time.
sentences.cn: 受穷受苦使他未老先衰.

sentences.en: He was cradled in the lap of penury.
sentences.cn: 他自幼生活在贫困的环境里.

sentences.en: He was talking about the embarrassment penury - and advocating higher salaries for MPs.
sentences.cn: 这席话意指当时议员们经济窘迫,并提倡提高议员待遇.

sentences.en: He who sows misery, reaps but penury!
sentences.cn: 他造成悲惨!他造成贫穷!
我们怎样才能摆脱贫困?

sentences.en: In all labour there is profit : but the talk of the lips tendeth only to penury.
sentences.cn: 23诸般勤劳,都有益处.嘴上多言,乃致穷乏.

sentences.en: Laid - off workers fall into penury.
sentences.cn: 下岗 职工陷入贫困.

sentences.en: Mr Thomas was born in penury and grew up with bare feet and intestinal worms.
sentences.cn: 托马斯出身微寒,伴着光脚丫儿、肚里住着蛔虫的日子长大.
